import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import blogcategory from '../../data/blogcategory.json'; class Portfoliosidebar extends Component { render() { return (
{/* Service cat */}
Category
    {blogcategory.map((item, i) => (
  • {item.title}
    • ))}
{/* Brouchers widget */}
Brouchers
  • DOWNLOAD PDF FILE
  • OUR ISO CERTIFICATES
  • OUR ISO CERTIFICATES
{/* Contact Widget */}
